description:
"The Julius Baer Generation Cup, the fifth regular tournament in the Meltwater Champions Chess Tour, takes place September 18-25, 2022 on chess24. The preliminary phase is a 16-player rapid (15|10) round-robin over four days. The top eight players advance to a four-day knockout that consists of two days of four-game rapid matches, which advance to blitz (5|3) and armageddon (White has five minutes, Black four with no increment) tiebreaks only if a knockout match is tied after the second day."

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Norwegian chess grandmaster Magnus Carlsen wins the 2022 Julius Baer Generation Cup. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". If it can be definitively determined at any point that Magnus Carlsen will not be the winner of the Cup based on the rules of the tournament, this market may immediately resolve to "No".

If for any reason the tournament is cancelled or rescheduled to a date after October 7, 2022, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official website for the Julius Baer Generation Cup (https://chess24.com/tour/), however other credible sources may be used.

markets.question: Will Magnus Carlsen win the Julius Baer Generation Cup?
